scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:kb-api" "npm run dev:app-api" "npm run dev:ops-api" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:kb-api && npm run build:app-api && npm run build:ops-api && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:kb-api && npm run deploy:app-api && npm run deploy:ops-api && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd apps/frontend && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:cloudflare: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:backend: npm run deploy:kb-api && npm run deploy:app-api && npm run deploy:ops-api
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd apps/frontend && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=pedi-psych-kb-frontend
scripts.setup:cloudflare: npm run setup:database && npm run setup:kv && npm run setup:domain
scripts.setup:kv: wrangler kv:namespace create POLICIES_PROD || true && wrangler kv:namespace create POLICIES_PROD_PREVIEW || true
scripts.setup:domain: echo 'Please configure your custom domain in Cloudflare dashboard'
scripts.db:reset: wrangler d1 delete pedi-psych-kb-prod && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.start:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:production
scripts.start:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:staging
scripts.start:development: npm run build && npm run deploy:development
scripts.health:check: curl -f http://localhost:8787/health && curl -f http://localhost:8788/health && curl -f http://localhost:8789/health || echo 'Some services are not healthy'
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.ci:build: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.ci:deploy: npm run ci:build && npm run deploy:production
